ğŸ” TECHNICAL DETAILS:

Battery Read Retry Logic:
```javascript
async retryBatteryRead(maxRetries = 3) {
  const delays = [2000, 5000, 10000]; // Progressive delays
  
  for (let attempt = 0; attempt < maxRetries; attempt++) {
    // Wait between attempts
    if (attempt > 0) {
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delays[attempt - 1]));
    }
    
    // Check cluster availability
    if (!endpoint?.clusters?.powerConfiguration) continue;
    
    // Try read
    const batteryPercentage = await endpoint.clusters.powerConfiguration.readAttributes([...]);
    
    if (success) return battery;
  }
  
  return null; // Graceful failure
}
```

Benefits:
- âœ… Handles slow Zigbee initialization
- âœ… Doesn't spam the network (progressive delays)
- âœ… Graceful failure (no crashes)
- âœ… Clear logging for diagnostics

**PROBLÃˆME ROOT CAUSE:**
Les buttons (button_wireless_4, remote, scene switches) Ã©taient INCORRECTEMENT dÃ©tectÃ©s comme des switches et recevaient la capability `onoff`, alors que:

```
[SMART ADAPT] Device Type: switch (confidence: 0.9)  âŒ WRONG!
[SMART ADAPT] Missing: onoff                        âŒ WRONG!
[SMART ADAPT] Added missing capability: onoff       âŒ DISASTER!
```

âœ… SOLUTION APPLIQUÃ‰E - 3 NIVEAUX DE PROTECTION:

**1. SmartDriverAdaptation.analyzeClusters() - LEVEL 1**

BEFORE (WRONG ORDER):
```javascript

```

AFTER (CORRECT ORDER):
```javascript

  driverName.includes('button') || 
  driverName.includes('remote') || 
  driverName.includes('wireless') ||
  driverName.includes('scene')
);

if (isButtonDriver) {
  analysis.deviceType = 'button';
  analysis.powerSource = 'battery';
  analysis.confidence = 0.99;  // HIGHEST!
  
  // CRITICAL: RETURN IMMEDIATELY!

}

// USB Outlet detection (SECOND)

else if (hasOnOffCluster) { ... }  // âœ… Never runs for buttons!
```

**2. SmartDriverAdaptation.detectRealCapabilities() - LEVEL 2**

```javascript

  this.log('ğŸ”˜ BUTTON DEVICE - Special capability rules:');
  this.log('   âœ… Buttons ONLY need: measure_battery');

    'dim',

}
```

**3. BaseHybridDevice.registerAllCapabilitiesWithReporting() - LEVEL 3**

```javascript
async registerAllCapabilitiesWithReporting() {
  // ğŸš¨ CRITICAL: Check if button/remote
  const driverName = this.driver?.id || '';

    return;  // âœ… Exit immediately!
  }
  
  // Normal device registration continues...
}
```
